events.1240: Radiya Sultan, first lady ruler of Delhi throne, passed away in a battle.
events.1679: More than 20,000 lives were claimed near Massurla Pattanam city, costal area of South India, in a severe storm.
events.1781: A treaty was singed between the Britishers and ruler of Gwalior, Scindia.
events.1911: Sister Nivedita, follower of Vivekanand, died.
events.1967: Vasant Prabhu, famous music director, died.
events.1971: Hitesh Modi, cricketer (Kenyan left-handed batsman 1996 World Cup), was born.
events.1978: Maharashtra branch of Forward Block Party merged in Indira Congress.
events.1987: Kishore Kumar Ganguly, well known singer, died in Bombay.
events.1989: Panchayati Raj and Nagarpalika Bills defeated in Rajya Sabha.
events.1991: Shatrughan Sinha, film star, decides to contest New Delhi Lok Sabha seat on a BJP ticket against Rajesh Khanna, the Congress nominee.
events.1998: India, Mauritius sign an agreement on civil aviation in New Delhi in the presence of its two Prime Ministers.
events.1999: Chandrababu Naidu, TDP leader, said that his party would support the NDA Government unconditionally.
